GPUCanvasContext.summary: The GPUCanvasContext interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents the WebGPU rendering context of a {{htmlelement("canvas")}} element, returned via an call with a contextType of "webgpu".

GPUCanvasContextCanvas.summary:
The canvas read-only property of the
interface returns a reference to the canvas that the context was created from.

GPUCanvasContextConfigure.summary:
The configure() method of the
interface configures the context to use for rendering with a given . When called the canvas will initially be cleared to transparent black.

GPUCanvasContextGetConfiguration.summary:
The getConfiguration() method of the
interface returns the current configuration set for the context.
GPUCanvasContextGetConfiguration.returns: An object containing the configuration options set on the context (i.e., via the method), or null if no configuration is set (either no configuration was previously set, or a configuration was set and then was called on the context).

GPUCanvasContextGetCurrentTexture.summary:
The getCurrentTexture() method of the
interface returns the next to be composited to the document by the canvas context.

GPUCanvasContextUnconfigure.summary:
The unconfigure() method of the
interface removes any previously-set context configuration, and destroys any textures returned via while the canvas context was configured.
